choices: Kyoko, pissed after you killed Makoto
1111.content:
(Your Name) Execution Executed. That was what the big, red words said as you suddenly feel the something grab your neck. It was the same device that was used to grab Leon towards his inevitable doom. You were then yanked away from the group and were going into high speed. You think about your last moments in life. Killing Makoto so You could go free, soon to be discovered as the culprit. You were wish in you never took that chance as you were soon feeling a great pain after stopping on what seemed to be a hard surface. You then see two mechanic hands, each of them having a can of spray. You would then be sprayed with something green, slowing knocking you out.

You soon wake up on something soft. You would tried to get up, but you were restrained by your arms and feet. You then notice that your in a room you don't really reconize, however it seem larger than usual. "What's going on?" You ask yourself. With the only part of your body you can move being your head, you see lights around you and a poster that says free seat. "What the he'll is going on!?" You panick as you tried struggling to break free from being trapped. However, it was no use, your restraints were to strong. You then hear someone approaching you, it was...
1111.title: The most comfortable seat one can buy.

choices: Kyoko got up, her "turn" was done.
11111.content:
You would see a familiar figure approaching you. It was Kyoko Kirigiri, the Ultimate....... well, you don't know her ultimate. "Kyoko, I don't know how you got big and what this room is, but you gotta help me! I don't know what that bear is planning, so please!" You begged and pleaded, but she ignored you with an angered look on her face. "Huh, free seat. Let's see how comfortable the seat is." Kyoko said, turning around. All you could see were her big, black panties, which were coming closer and closer with each second. "Please, wait, i'm not a seat i'm a hum-." You were cut short as Kyoko giant ass coming down and you were sat on by the white haired girl without any hesitation.

"Mmmmmph! Mmmmmmph!" You would scream, your screams being muffled by Kyoko's giant ass covering your entire small body. Kyoko would then slowly rub her big posterior around you, grinding your your small body between a cushion and her round butt. Huh, you seem kinda comfy, maybe i'll let you live awhile longer. "Kyoko said coldly. "Mmmmph!?" You muffled, you were confused. What did She mean let you live, I being her seat the execution, you had many questions, but no matter what, you couldn't escape Kyoko's giant ass covering you.

Then...
11111.title: The Ultimate ???'s new seat
